title: Sono Otoko, Taka: God Finger Densetsu
original_name: TAKA その男、タカ 加藤鷹ゴールドフィンガー伝説
sinopse:
A manga about love between porn stars. Amidst all the rampant sex and graphic situations, lies a story which depicts the harsh nature of the porn industry... This is Monden Akiko at her best!

(Source: JShoujo Scans)
